title: Leeds School of Business Technology-Enabled Learning Fund
description: To provide support for the growth and leadership in technology-enabled education at the Leeds School of Business at the University of Colorado Boulder.
marketingContent:
Create a competitive advantage through video and audio content;
Develop customized techniques to increase student engagement specific to business classes;
Embrace transformation with the agility to switch between face-to-face, hybrid, and other formats;
Leapfrog to next-generation Ed Tech.
